newsitem.title: FINLAND: NOKIA ADR ENDS UP AT $67-1/8 (FIM 332.30).
newsitem.headline: NOKIA ADR ENDS UP AT $67-1/8 (FIM 332.30).

text.p: Nokia's A share ADR closed up $1-3/4 at $67-1/8 in New York on Wednesday ahead of its 1996 earnings report on Thursday.
Nokia's Wall Street closing equals about 332.30 markka.
In Helsinki on Wednesday, Nokia A closed down 1.00 markka at 323.00 markka.
Valmet's ADR (two shares) closed flat at $36 on Wall Street. The price equals about 89.10 markka. In Helsinki, Valmet closed up 0.30 markka at 89.80.
Rauma's ADR ended $0-1/2 higher at $22-3/4 in New York on Tuesday. The price equals about 112.60 markka.
In Helsinki on Wednesday, Rauma closed up 4.50 markka at 113.00.
